A Big Fix: Radical Solutions for Australia's Environmental Crisis bụ akwụkwọ afọ 2005 nkè Ian Lowe dere nke na-ekwu na ịdọ aka ná ntị sitere n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi dị ngwa ma doo anya

Prọfesọ Lowe na-atụ aro na a na-eji ihe onwunwe eme ihe ngwa ngwa, usoro gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi na-emebi, na ọha mmadụ na-eme ka ọ ghara ịdị mma site na ọdịiche na-arịwanye elu n'etiti ndị ọgaranya na ndị ogbenye
Lowe na-atụ aro ọtụtụ ngwọta siri ike

Ọ na-akwado mgbanwe dị mkpa na ụkpụrụ onwé anyị na ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma na-enye ọhụụ nké ọha mmadụ dị mma karịa nke mmadụ, na-ewere usoro gburugburu ebe obibi, na-ewe echiche ogologo ógè, ma na-akwanyere usoro okike ùgwù.
